description: You thought the assignments, the projects, the FYP would never end. But the time has finally come to bid adieu to the place you call your second home. The source of infinite smiles, a few heartbreaks and a lifetime worth of memories.
We invite the Junior and the Senior batches to come together and make this evening a memorable one. Let’s send off our Seniors out into the “real world” in a way they’ll remember for years to come!
Let the tears gush because this will be one amazing ending to what has been an amazing journey.
*More details (including the theme) will be disclosed shortly. Stay tuned!*
name: SGA - SEECS Farewell Dinner 2016
